subject: Implement valid review suggestions
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Review findings from CodeRabbit and local code review, implement any valid suggestions.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All valid review suggestions implemented
- [ ] Tests still pass after changes

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`

**Verification:**
- Type: test
- Command: `bun test -- tests/unit/config/jest-base.test.ts`
- Expected: All tests pass after implementing review suggestions

learnings: All three local code reviews (bug, CLAUDE.md compliance, consistency) found zero actionable issues for this trivial change
